lead_paragraph: Carl Edwards held off a late challenge in qualifying for the Sharpie 500 Nascar Sprint Cup race Saturday night in Bristol, Tenn., claiming the fourth pole of his Cup series career. Edwards took his Ford Fusion around the half-mile, high-banked oval in 15.746 seconds, an average of 121.86 miles per hour, early in qualifying. He bumped David Reutimann’s Toyota Camry to the second spot at 15.835 seconds..
